title: Magic Resilient
description: Verdie Vestri has the power to control the winds. She's a siege survivor and teenage war heroine with her eyeliner on point and her self-esteem smudged. At the Magical Girl Academy, she makes new friends- and even gets a crush on one of them. But can she challenge monsters when she's still fighting her own thoughts? To reach her true potential, she'll have to fly above the burden of her turbulent past.
author: Kayla Bashe
